tweet: Thank you Dr. Brad Barrett and Mary Ann Barrett for visiting out Washington, D.C. office today. Dr. Barrett represents Indiana's 56th District in the State Legislature, and we appreciate your work to take Indiana to the #NextLevel! #Indiana #IN06 pic.twitter.com/0mCSy1GPnS

We commemorate National Vietnam War Veterans Day to thank and honor our nation’s Vietnam veterans and their families. Over 130,000 Hoosiers served during the Vietnam War, and we are eternally grateful for their service and sacrifice. @TheRepublicNews 🇺🇸 https://bit.ly/2CM7D7m

⚠️#HR1 = Bad for Hoosiers⚠️

HR 1 is a Washington DC power grab that empowers illegal immigrants to vote. pic.twitter.com/ByAvGP0akd

⚠️#HR1 Weakens Our Election System⚠️

It weakens our election system. Indiana controls its own elections, not unelected bureaucrats in Washington, D.C. pic.twitter.com/KaLAOlTG1n

It places such unprecedented limits to free speech that even the left-leaning @ACLU opposes it. Make no mistake, the left wants to stifle political discourse, as we see on college campuses, and this legislation furthers that goal. pic.twitter.com/UOJRP3Lmvw

#HR1 Takes A Hammer To The First Amendment 📃🔨

H.R. 1 places such unprecedented limits to free speech that even the @ACLU is opposed to it. Make no mistake, the left wants to stifle political discourse and this legislation will further that goal. https://bit.ly/2C5G1cW

#HR1 Will Fund Democrat Campaigns With Taxpayer Money (7/7)

Democrats want a new political ATM for congressional campaigns by granting a 6:1 taxpayer-funded match for all small donor contributions of $200 or less. So, for every $200, the federal government will match $1,200.

#HR1 Is Political Cover For The Far-Left (6/7)

It's all about power, anti-Trumpism, electing Democrats & stifling political discourse. It's a hodge-podge list of far-left policies cooked up inside liberal think tanks. Dems want to cover for an extreme minority on the far-left.

#HR1 Weakens Our Election System (5/7)

This bill actually makes our election system more vulnerable to outside threats by employing a one size fits all standard. A big component of our election system's security is the de-centralized nature of the system.

#HR1 Takes A Hammer To The First Amendment (4/7) 📃🔨

H.R. 1 places such unprecedented limits to free speech that even the @ACLU is opposed to it. Make no mistake, the left wants to stifle political discourse and this legislation will further that goal.

#HR1 Is A Power Grab (3/7)

This bill takes decision-making power from Hoosiers and gives it to bureaucrats in Washington, D.C. It forces States to adopt online registration, same-day registration, and automatic voter registration, thus imposing a one-size-fits-all standard.

#HR1 Is Unconstitutional (2/7)

It places unprecedented limits to free speech and will subject Indiana to federal mandates that allows for illegal immigrants to vote.

🚨 Thoughts on #HR1 (Tweet Thread 1/7) 🚨

Do not be fooled, H.R. 1 is not a piece of legislation “for the people” as my colleagues across the aisle claim. This is nothing more than a power grab “for Democrats in Washington D.C.”
